mapper.select: SELECT USER_NUMBER , USER_NAME,USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, tm.MEMBERSHIP_NAME , USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER tu JOIN TBL_MEMBERSHIP tm ON tm.MEMBERSHIP_NUMBER = tu.MEMBERSHIP_NUMBER ORDER BY USER_NUMBER DESC

SELECT LEVEL_NUMBER , LEVEL_TITLE , tu.USER_NUMBER , tu.USER_NAME, tu.USER_ID , tm.MEMBERSHIP_NAME FROM TBL_LEVEL tl JOIN TBL_USER tu ON tu.USER_NUMBER = tl.USER_NUMBER JOIN TBL_MEMBERSHIP tm ON tm.MEMBERSHIP_NUMBER = tu.MEMBERSHIP_NUMBER ORDER BY LEVEL_NUMBER DESC
